data.eml:eml: A collation of records primarily derived captured from Natural Resources Wales (formerly Countryside Council for Wales) North Region paper files by Cofnod staff. More recent records have been entered by staff of Natural Resources Wales onto the Cofnod Online Recording System. This dataset includes Sensitive species records (as described in our Data Sourcing, Management and Use policy available from the Cofnod website), however they are not sensitive at the resolution supplied and as their site names and any attached comments have been removed.
